summary: In a post-apocalyptic 2019, a lone gunman named Yuma fights a gang of bandits called the United Regime who have invaded the town of New Hope.
cast: Joe Lara|Bo Svenson|Stacie Foster|Brion James|Kane Hodder|James C. Victor|Billy L. Sullivan|Brian Huckeba|Jim Cody Williams|Robert O'Reilly|Joe Hart|Adolfo Quinones|Bruce Ed Morrow|Sandra Ellis Lafferty|Paul G. Volk|Scott McAboy|Ernie Lee Banks|Quinn Morrison|Afifi Alaouie|William Michael Quinn|Gordon Benson|Michael Ross Clements
director: Directors: Joe Hart (as Jacobsen Hart), Paul G. Volk
title: Los caballeros de la muerte
